amendment.description: To reaffirm the prohibition on torture.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1889 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 78 - 21. Record Vote Number: 209.

action.text: Amendment SA 1889 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator McCain to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3910-3911; text: CR S3910-3911) To reaffirm the prohibition on torture.
